name: SuperMarioWorld
description:
Arrow keys to move, up arrow to jump, space bar to spin, and W to jump and ASD to move Z to shoot  with the fire flower, run at full speed for a bit to dash, and press space to enter levels.

 Got lazy and now there is only 3 levels All credits go to Nintendo. If it take too long just download at here https://www.mediafire.com/file/5lkmkb7b9pdqn7c/supermarioworld.html/file
